text: a loko bhala'ithi pahela bura'i mate utavala kari rahya che, kharekhara temanathi pahelana loko para prakopa avi pahoncyo che, ane kharekhara tamaro palanahara mapha karanara che, lokona khota atyacara karava pachi pana. Ane a pana cokkasa vata che ke tamaro palanahara ghani ja sakhata saja apanara pana che
